sentences.en: Even so, debenture systems are opaque debenture - holders and accepted students is unknown.
sentences.cn: 即使如此, “学校债券”的体系仍是不透明的----债券持有者与入学人数之间的比例是不公开的.

sentences.en: If an applicant meets the school's standards, a debenture places him atthe head of the queue.
sentences.cn: 符合学校标准的申请学生,如持有债券就可优先考虑.

sentences.en: The Group rents out its club debenture under operating leases.
sentences.cn: 本集团根据经营租约租出其会所债券.

sentences.en: Thus it can be seen, may exchange the debenture issue demand to be exuberant.
sentences.cn: 由此可见, 可交换债券发行需求旺盛.
